mapper.insert:

order_id,

) VALUES (
#{id},

#{serviceId},
#{workDuration},
#{aduitDuration},

)
mapper.select:
SELECT id as id, order_id as orderId, order_no as orderNo, service_id as serviceId, work_duration as workDuration, aduit_duration as aduitDuration, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM fm_order_duration_info
and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE fm_order_duration_info
order_id = #{orderId},
order_no = #{orderNo},
service_id = #{serviceId},
work_duration = #{workDuration},
aduit_duration = #{aduitDuration},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
and id = #{id}
